title: Unable to access Public chat rooms
body: Hey i have been unable to join default public chat rooms like Public chat and LFG. Is there some thing i can do to fix this?

replies.body:
Strange. I recently tried this and I couldn't do it myself. I thought it was just because I didn't use the right case/spelling or something, and left it at that.

Try posting this in Misc. and see if a red notices.
